titleStmt.title: Seismos megas. Or Heaven & earth shaken. A treatise shewing how kings, princes, and their governments are turned and changed by Jesus Christ as [brace] King of Kings, and King of Saints. / By John Davis, M.A. sometime lecturer at Christ Church in London, and now pastour of a congregation in Dover.
titleStmt.author: Davis, John, pastor of a congregation in Dover.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.C. for Nathaniel Brooke at the Angel in Cornhill.,

notesStmt.note: The first two words are transliterated from the Greek.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
